00021         public function newQuery(){
00022                 $this->tables  = array();
00023                 $this->wheres  = array();
00024                 $this->whereColumns = array();
00025                 $this->whereComparisons = array();
00026                 $this->whereValues = array();

00029                 $this->limit   = '';
00030                 $this->columns = array();
00031                 $this->fields  = array();

00034                 $this->joins   = array();

00038         public function from(){
00039                 $tables = func_get_args();
00040                 $tables = $tables[0];
00041                 if(!$tables){
00042                         $this->error('You cannot select from no tables');
00043                 }
00044                 if(!is_array($tables)){
00045                         $tables = array($tables);
00046                 }
00047                 foreach($tables as $table){
00048                         $this->tables[] = $table;
00049                 }
00050         }
00051 
00052         public function setFrom($table){
00053                 $this->tables = array();
00054                 $this->from($table);
00055         }
00056 
00057         public function addGroupBy($column){
00058                 if(!$column){
00059                         $this->error('You cannot group by no column');
00060                 }
00061                 $this->groupBy[] = $column;
00062         }
00063 
00064         public function addOrder($column, $order){
00065                 if(!$column){
00066                         $this->error('You cannot order by no column');
00067                 }
00068                 $order = strtoupper($order);
00069                 if(!in_array($order, array('ASC', 'DESC'))){
00070                         $this->error('Order in addOrder has to be either ASC or DESC');
00071                 }
00072                 $this->orderBy[] = "$column $order";
00073         }
00074 
00075         public function setLimit($int){
00076                 if($int <= 0){
00077                         $this->error('The limit must be greater than 0');
00078                 }
00079                 $this->limit = $int;
00080         }

00083                 if($int <= -1){

00089         public function addWhere($column, $value=null, $comparison=null){
00090                 if($value && !$comparison){
00091                         $comparison = '=';
00092                 }
00093                 $this->whereColumns[] = $column;
00094                 $this->whereComparisons[] = $comparison;
00095                 $this->whereValues[] = $value;
